product_name: Garmin TOPO 100K microSD Data Card - Mexico
long_description: For your adventures south of the border, bring the Garmin TOPO 100K microSD Data Card which serves up detailed digital topographic coverage and street maps for all of Mexico on compatible GPS units. With a 1:100,000 scale, enjoy a wide array of topographic information, from terrain contours, elevations and summits to perennial and intermittent lakes, rivers and streams. 3-D terrain shading and elevation profiles help estimate terrain difficulty. Displays national and state park names as well as wilderness areas, routable roads and trails. Includes searchable points of interest, such as campgrounds, geographic places and restaurants. The Garmin TOPO Mexico microSD Data Card comes with an SD card adapter. Note: maps on microSD and SD cards cannot be copied or viewed on a computer.
short_description: For your adventures south of the border, bring the Garmin TOPO 100K microSD Data Card which serves up detailed digital topographic coverage and street maps for all of Mexico on compatible GPS units.
